imdb.title: Hero Mask
imdb.plot: Detective James Blood investigates a string of grisly crimes all involving a mysterious mask.

episodes.title: Episode #2.1
episodes.plot: The SSC's new director has his own ideas about how to operate the organization. Eddy's research turns up a lead: former scientist William Herst.

episodes.title: Episode #2.2
episodes.plot: Connor and Creighton break into Herst's house to get to Tina. William fails to hold them off, but James and Wyatt show up to confront the intruders.

episodes.title: Episode #2.3
episodes.plot: Harry leads a team into assaulting the supposedly secure SSC safe house where Tina and James are holed up. Somehow, SSC must have been compromised.

episodes.title: Episode #2.4
episodes.plot: While on the run from the SSC, James and Tina are deliberately hit by a truck. Looking for answers, James makes contact with Anna Winehouse.

episodes.title: Episode #2.5
episodes.plot: With Eddy's help, James tries to infiltrate the site where Tina is being held. Connor tells Tina about her family's involvement with the masks.

episodes.title: Episode #2.6
episodes.plot: James hands Connor over to Wyatt. In custody, Connor maintains his silence until Anna asks to question him herself.

episodes.title: Episode #2.7
episodes.plot: Anna tells Tina about the research that preceded her birth. William Herst regains consciousness. Coates meets with a mysterious individual.

episodes.title: Episode #2.8
episodes.plot: Waiting for her father, Tina looks at Anna's old pictures of her parents. Wyatt and Eddy work together to find Gary Evans and stumble into an ambush.

episodes.title: Episode #2.9
episodes.plot: Coates puts out a warrant on Evans. James, Anna, Tina and Herst try to escape the hospital via helicopter, but Connor is already inside.

episodes.title: Episode #1.1
episodes.plot: Prosecutor Monica Campbell has the SSC department protect a key witness. When Monica's killed, her colleague Sarah asks the SSC to investigate.

episodes.title: Episode #1.2
episodes.plot: An escaped criminal makes a bloody appearance at the SSC office despite being presumed dead, and James and Sarah head into the countryside in pursuit.

episodes.title: Episode #1.3
episodes.plot: SSC agent Harry Creighton takes a job with LIVE Corporation after a personal tragedy. The SSC retrieval team's actions do not go unobserved.

episodes.title: Episode #1.4
episodes.plot: Investigating Grimm's past, Eddy heads to an abandoned prison and learns of other mysterious deaths. Creighton searches for a missing sample.

episodes.title: Episode #1.5
episodes.plot: Theo thwarts the attack thanks to the Mask he's carrying. Eddy attempts to follow Theo, and James catches sight of Creighton in the crowd.

episodes.title: Episode #1.6
episodes.plot: James manages to protect Theo's family, but on the other side of the city, Creighton stalks Theo and Eddy as they head for the SSC station.

episodes.title: Episode #1.7
episodes.plot: In the hospital, Sarah remembers a key detail about the case. As Eddy struggles with the aftermath of the attack, Steven Martland takes a meeting.

episodes.title: Episode #1.8
episodes.plot: After Sarah's identification, James does a little breaking and entering. Creighton meets with the leader of the Mask project.

episodes.title: Episode #1.9
episodes.plot: James wrangles a meeting with Anna Winehouse, who he saw in photos at Fred Faraday's home. She gives him another lead, and Sarah continues her search.

episodes.title: Episode #1.10
episodes.plot: With Fred's dog in tow, James heads to Connor's apartment. At the lab, Connor has something to show Creighton. Sarah shares her suspicions with Eddy.

episodes.title: Episode #1.11
episodes.plot: Sarah compares notes with a journalist who's been investigating LIVE. Still at Connor's apartment, James deals with another wave of attackers.

episodes.title: Episode #1.12
episodes.plot: After learning about her boss's past, Sarah figures out a potential connection between him, Monica and LIVE. Then she calls Eddy.

episodes.title: Episode #1.13
episodes.plot: The SSC tries to extract Fred from the building, but the quartet intercepts them. After watching on the feed, Creighton and Connor decide to step in.

episodes.title: Episode #1.14
episodes.plot: James joins Creighton as he confronts one of the remaining assassins. Meanwhile, Gallagher and his boss stand by in Fred's surgical bay.

episodes.title: Episode #1.15
episodes.plot: With Martland taken in for questioning, Richard recalls the incident that first put him on LIVE's trail. Sarah is determined to get justice for Monica.
